items.description:
Planning and executing renovation work of a 42 m² Apartment in Kreuzberg, Berlin.
From small repairs on wall and wooden floors to acoustic ceilings. New kitchen including wiring work. Retrofitting from antique wooden doors. New storage system. Next step, rejuvenate the bathroom.
